name: Myskur "the Eel" Marquardt

specials.name: Keen Eyes
specials.description: The Eel gains a +2 circumstance bonus when using the Seek action to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet. When he targets an opponent that is concealed or hidden from him, he reduces the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.

specials.name: Alchemical Formulas
specials.description: (12th) greater acid flask, greater alchemist’s fire, greater antidote, greater darkvision elixir, moderate elixir of life, shadow essence, moderate sea touch elixir

specials.name: Expanded Splash
specials.description: The Eel's bombs that have the splash trait deal 6 extra splash damage, and splash to 10 feet.

specials.name: Quick Alchemy
specials.description: Cost 1 batch of infused reagents; Effect The Eel creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.

specials.name: Quick Bomber
specials.description: The Eel Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.

specials.name: Infused Items
specials.description: The Eel carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused greater acid flasks (4), infused greater alchemist’s fires (4), infused greater antidote (2), infused greater darkvision (2), infused moderate elixir of life (4), infused reagents (8), infused shadow essence (2), infused moderate sea touch elixir (2).

items: +1 leather armor, +1 striking shortsword, alchemist's tools, formula book, greater alchemist goggles
languages: Common, Draconic, Gnome, Halfling, Infernal, Polyglot
